description:
Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Abkhaz, Acehnese, Acholi, Afar, Afrikaans, Albanian, Alur, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Avar, Awadhi, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Balinese, Baluchi, Bambara, Baoulé, Bashkir, Basque, Batak Karo, Why use multiple apps when you can track all your TCGs in one place? Most collectors collect multiple TCGs. Whether you are a Pokemon collector, Magic collector, YuGiOh collector, MetaZoo collector, or even a Funko collector, this app is for you!



Collectr is a next-generation portfolio manager. We allow you to manage, track and value all your raw, graded and sealed cards in the palm of your hand. It’s never been easier to view your TCG collections as a portfolio. 



Leverage our real-time database of 200,000+ products to instantly value your products. 



We have data available for the following TCGs:
- Magic The Gathering
- Yu-Gi-Oh!
- Pokémon
- Vanguard
- Force of Will
- Weiss Schwarz
- Final Fantasy
- Star Wars Destiny
- Dragon Ball Super
- Funko
- Transformers
- Flesh and Blood
- Digimon
- Gate Ruler
- MetaZoo


KEY FEATURES 
- Build Your Collection - Search and add products from our 200,000+ product catalog
- Value Your Portfolio - Instantly understand and track the value of your collections
- Track Market Trends - Gain real-time insights into the performance of your collection
- Multi-Currency Support - Know the value of your collection in any currency (including crypto!)
- Biggest Gains/Losses - Understand the biggest movers in your portfolio in real-time


ADDITIONAL FEATURES THAT REQUIRE IN-APP PURCHASE
- Unlimited Card Scanning
- Exclusive Filters
- Data Exports
- Social Custom Backgrounds

Download our app today and start managing your collection in the most advanced and efficient way possible!


---

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Translate text, voice, and photos in 320 different languages. Featuring a translator keyboard and live voice translator.

Whether you need to translate for travel, work, study, or everyday conversation, Translate Now is your ultimate AI-powered language translator. Break language barriers instantly with Translate Now’s multilingual translation tools, making every interaction seamless.

Key Features

▶ Hands-Free Voice Translator for Live Conversations
Effortlessly overcome language barriers with a real-time, hands-free voice translator. Simply speak into your device for instant two-way translation and enjoy multilingual conversations with ease.
▶ Photo Translator for Real-Time Translation
Translate menus, signs, and documents instantly with your camera. Just snap a photo for a real-time translation—perfect for travel and navigating world languages.
▶ Translator Keyboard for Multilingual Chat
Type in your native language and send translations in real-time in 60 different languages within any app for effortless messaging.
▶ AI Translator for Instant Text Understanding
Translate text with AI-enhanced accuracy, phonetic support, and context-aware translation in 320+ languages.
▶ AR Live Translator for an Immersive Local Experience
Use your camera and augmented reality to translate in real-time, making language learning and travel more intuitive.
▶ AI-Powered Dictionary & Grammar Assistant
Expand your vocabulary with contextual meanings and receive real-time grammar corrections for more precise translations.

Translate Now offers various AI Translation Models, Phrasebook, Watch App, Translation Extension, Offline Mode, Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, Interactive Widgets, and SharePlay.

Download Translate Now today, your ultimate AI language translator! Experience the power of language translation at your fingertips. Text, speak, and translate effortlessly between French, Spanish, English, Punjabi, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Bangla, and more!

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at $4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

Real-Time Card Values

Whether you're a casual fan or serious collector, HoloDex helps you stay organized, make smarter trades and track your collection with confidence.

With 300,000+ coin types, 99% recognition accuracy, and an AI-powered database, CoinSnap is a companion for coin enthusiasts. Whether you're identifying a rare error coin, uncovering the value of a hidden gem, or organizing a collection of hundreds of coins, CoinSnap makes it fast, easy, and fun to explore the fascinating world of numismatics.

Key Features:
AI-Powered Coin Recognition
Instantly identify coins from around the globe with a quick photo or upload.
Coverage of over 240,000 coin types with an impressive 99% recognition accuracy.
Supports high-resolution photography for precision results.

Comprehensive Coin Information
Receive detailed overviews, including coin name, origin, year of issue, mint count, and more.
Check rarity levels and access up-to-date market prices.
Explore multiple coin encyclopedias for in-depth knowledge.

Professional Coin Analysis
Identify rare misprinted coins with expert analysis reports.
Access coin grading reports with detailed breakdowns and estimated market values.
Backed by insights from professional numismatists.

Smart Collection Management
Create and manage your personalized coin collection effortlessly.
Organize coins by series and track the total value of your collectibles.
Keep your collection secure and accessible anytime.

Why Choose CoinSnap?
Lightning-fast and accurate coin recognition.
Extensive database covering coins from every corner of the world.
All-in-one solution for identification, grading, and collection management.

** The #1 Prayer App & #1 Catholic App **

WHAT IS HALLOW
Hallow is a Christian prayer app that offers audio-guided meditation sessions to help us grow in our faith & spiritual lives and find peace in God. Explore over 10,000 different sessions on contemplative prayer, meditation, Catholic Bible readings, music, and more.

In today’s world, we’re stressed, anxious, distracted, & can’t sleep. At the same time, we’re searching for deeper meaning, purpose, & relationships. We believe these two challenges can be addressed with the same solution: peace in Jesus. In the end, after all, a halo in heaven is the goal :)

WHAT YOU GET
* Daily prayers: Pray daily across methods including 3 of our most popular - Lectio Divina (on the Daily Readings), the Rosary, & the Divine Mercy Chaplet
* Christian Meditation: This can seem similar to mindfulness meditation in learning to be comfortable in silence, but the difference is the goal is never to remain in ourselves, but always to lift our hearts & minds to God, to talk with Him, listen to Him, & recognize His presence with us
* Sleep Bible Stories: Try Night Prayer from Liturgy of the Hours / Daily Office, and Catholic Bible stories read by folks like Jonathan Roumie from the Chosen or Fr. Mike Schmitz from the New American Bible
* Rosary: Meditate with Mary through the mysteries of the Catholic Rosary and other devotionals
* Ignatian Examen: Reflect on your day & discover an awareness of God, Jesus Christ, & the Holy Spirit
* Lectio Divina: Enter into a conversation with God through Bible passages / Scripture
* Taizé & Traditional Chant: Meditative chant & music
* Community: Match your prayers to the season with the Pray40 Lent Challenge, starting Ash Wednesday, or our Pray25 Advent Challenge for Christmas
* Homilies & Guests: From Father Mike Schmitz, and on topics on being a Catholic Dad, St. Augustine & more!
* Praylists: Sessions on joy, humility, discernment, or stress / anxiety / calm
* Challenges: Re-discover the Our Father, Stations of the Cross, Psalms, and Saints - or start with the Intro 9 Day Novena
* Litanies & Novenas: Try out the Litany of Humility, the 54 Day Novena, and more!
* Pray like a Champion today: Athlete Prayers
* Minute Meditations: Jesus, I Trust in You, Angelus, Rosary Decade, St. Michael the Archangel prayer and more!

Additional features to help customize your prayer experience:
* Journal after every prayer
* Choice of 50+ guides
* Options for 3 different lengths for every prayer (typically 5, 10, or 15 minutes)
* Ability to set prayer reminders
* Option to include calming background music like Gregorian Chant
* Ability to download sessions for offline listening
* Join a Hallow Family to share prayer intentions and prayer reflections with one another

As Hallow is a Catholic App (#1 among Catholic Apps), the content is developed by experienced Catholic theology and spirituality guides and reviewed by senior leaders within the Church (e.g., PhD’s, professors, Bishops, authors) and based on content from the approved Catholic Bible. We were also featured on EWTN. While it can be a beautiful app for Catholic men and women, it is meant as a resource for people of all faiths & religions.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
Users can access our daily prayers (including the rosary) and the 9-day Intro Prayer Challenge for free.
To access the full suite of Hallow, Hallow offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$9.99 per month
$69.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers.

Your Hallow subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Apple account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Hallow also integrates with the Apple Health app to sync mindfulness minutes.
Terms and conditions: https://hallow.com/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://hallow.com/privacy-policy

Step Into the Living Word! 

Haven isn’t just an app—it’s your personal guide to draw closer to God and discover unshakable peace. With hand-picked daily verses, thoughtful devotionals, and heartfelt prayers right in your pocket, every moment becomes an opportunity to grow in faith.  

Tap to explore the Bible, dive into rich verse citations, or ask Haven anything—God’s wisdom will flood your heart, strengthen your relationships, and reshape your life in beautiful, unexpected ways. Track your daily streak and feel the joy of bold, thriving faith. 

Your spiritual journey is calling! Chat with Haven anytime, anywhere.

Questions or feedback? We’d love to hear from you at havenappcontact1@gmail.com

Introducing EveryScan — your ultimate mobile companion app that transforms your smartphone into an advanced visual encyclopedia. Harness the power of cutting-edge AI image recognition to swiftly identify and gain insights on the world around you, directly from your mobile device.

Animal Identification
Curious about "what animal is this"? Use EveryScan to instantly identify animals, including specific breeds and characteristics. From cat breed recognizers to dog breed identifiers, this mobile app is your essential tool for comprehensive animal recognition.

Insect and Reptile Recognition
Dive into the insect world with our bug identifier. Capture images of caterpillars, spiders, and snakes using your mobile device, and learn about their characteristics and safety through our snake identifier, addressing questions like "what kind of snake is this?"

Mushroom and Plant Insights
Simply snap a picture to identify plants and fungi safely with your phone. Our app's flower and mushroom identifiers provide detailed care tips and safety information, directly enhancing your botanical knowledge.

Coin and Jewelry Examination
Easily scan coins and jewelry with your mobile to determine their value and history, answering queries like "how much are my coins worth?" Our coin scanner feature helps you check your coins' worth and origins swiftly.

Culinary Exploration
Identify food items, dishes, and recipes while accessing nutritional details right from your mobile device. Recognize dishes and their caloric content with ease, enhancing your culinary knowledge.

AI-Powered Features
- Accurate image recognition tailored for mobile use
- Instant object detection via your smartphone
- Universal object identifier: insect identifier, dog breed identifier, flower identifier, spider, snake identifier, etc.
- Real-time searching and scanning through your mobile
- Comprehensive data on everything from animals to everyday items
- Save and mark favorites for easy mobile access

Effortless Exploration
Skip search engines—just take a picture and identify items instantly using your phone. EveryScan integrates seamlessly with your mobile, offering an all-in-one picture identifier and AI image search capability. Unlock the secrets around you with curiosity and confidence. Download EveryScan today, and discover a world of knowledge at your fingertips.

Are you a coin collector looking to identify your latest find? Or maybe you stumbled upon a coin and want to know its value? Well, look no further! Introducing the new Coin Identifier - your one-stop-shop for all things coin-related. With just a snap of a picture, our app can identify your coin, provide detailed information about its history, estimate coin value, and even connect you with coin sellers and buyers. No more sifting through endless coin catalogs or scouring the internet for hours. Our app makes coin collecting easy, fun, and profitable. 

Key CoinIn features: 

Identify coins at lightning speed 
You won't have to spend hours searching through reference books or browsing the internet for visual confirmation.

Accurately identify over 270,000 coins 
Our large database contains more than 270 000 coins and allows you to identify any kind of coin. CoinIn scanner takes into account the type of material, time of creation, and coin condition, to provide you with the most precise and reliable information. 

Recognize rare, foreign, and error coins
Whether you're one of the seasoned coin collectors looking for a rare gem, or a newbie who’s just starting out, CoinIn has got you covered. 

Grade coins’ value, track prices in real time
Get an estimation of identified coins’ prices and an idea of the total value of your collection. CoinIn finder uses an API to provide you with a price tracker from numismatics platforms, so you know exactly how much your coins are worth. 

Follow coin collection trends 
Stay up to date with the coin collection series and be the first to add new gold and metal coins to your stock. 

Create a personalized online collection
Record, store, and access your collections right in the app anytime, anywhere. 

With CoinIn, you can turn your coin collection into a treasure trove - get started today!

About CoinIn Subscription:
- When you purchase CoinIn app subscription, the payment will be charged to your iTunes Account after confirmation. 
- The subscription will automatically renew, unless you turn off the auto-renew option at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
- The cost of renewal will be identified and charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
- If there is any unused portion of a free trial period offered, it will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription to the publication. 
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings after purchase. 

Ready to identify coins with ease? Get CoinIn today!

Night Sky is a powerful AI personal planetarium.

Quickly identify stars, planets, constellations and satellites above by simply holding your iPhone, iPad or Apple Watch to the Night Sky!  This is all done magically.  Whether you’re looking for a constellation, or the International Space Station, let Night Sky direct you to it, then explore the object in AR!

FEATURE SET: 

- NIGHT SKY + AURA (Night Sky + Aura Subscription required) - Your Personal AI Super Astronomer!  Ask Night Sky Aura virtually anything about Space and it will know the answer.  Night Sky Aura fully interfaces with features within Night Sky, to direct you to objects you’re interested in, provide information on anything to do with astronomy, or even show you how the sky looks on the other side of the world!  With your own personal AI Super Astronomer right by your side, Night Sky Aura becomes the new natural way to interact with the sky above! 

- SKY TAGS - Make Night Sky yours, by adding personal Sky Tags to the map!  Pin Sky Tags to objects in the sky to save for future reference, and share them via iMessage so others can find them!  Sky Tags can be categorized, and are completely personal to you.  Maybe you want to tag a star as a memorial to someone, or tag something you’d like to observe later that night.  You can even add Astrophotography photos and observation notes to your Sky Tags!  

- CONNECTED STARGAZING (+ Feature) - Connected Stargazing is a revolutionary new feature that utilizes SharePlay in iOS 15.1, allowing you to stargaze with others when you are apart!  Start a FaceTime Audio call with those who you would like to stargaze with, then create a session by adding objects for everyone to find in the sky!

- SPATIAL AUDIO OBJECT NAVIGATION - Using AirPods Pro or AirPods Max, search for an object when automatic sky tracking is on, and Night Sky will make the star, planet or constellation ‘chirp’ in the 360° soundscape, assisting you to navigate to the object with sound!

- AR SKY WINDOW - Erase the ceiling of your bedroom, lounge or classroom with AR!  Night Sky intelligently detects the ceiling or other flat surface in a room, and can make it magically disappear to reveal the sky behind it!  

- BILLIONS OF STARS!  (+ Feature) - Space is vast, so Night Sky has been hyper charged with over 1.7 BILLION STARS streamed from the cloud!  With a new super deep zoom (greater than 10X before), prepare to delve deeper into space than you ever imagined!

- MAPS UI - A clean and familiar interface with Search features including Quick Find, intelligent Night Red Mode, Light Pollution indicator and easy to use menu, prepare to navigate Night Sky quicker than ever before!

- AR PLANETARY PORTALS & AR GRAND ORRERY (+ Features) - Step onto the surface of other planets by placing AR portals around your room!  Or walk around the entire Solar System using the newly refreshed interactive Grand Orrery!

- NIGHT SKY WATCH AR - Night Sky magically comes to life on Apple Watch, with Glass Constellations, Red Vision, and Night Sky Live Tours - all on your wrist! 

- AR OBJECT EXPLORATION  - Pull Planets, Stars and Constellations out of the sky and look at them in detailed AR!

- NIGHT SKY TOURS (+ Feature):  Get a live sky tour or create your own sky tours for any location and time in the world!  

- NIGHT SKY MINDFULNESS (+ Feature) - A mindfulness stargazing experience adding mindfulness minutes with Apple HealthKit. 

- AND MANY MORE FEATURES! 


Subscription Information: 'Night Sky +' and 'Night Sky + Aura' are available as optional subscriptions. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage or cancel anytime in your App Store account settings. Ready for your citizenship test? Study for the Canadian citizenship test in 2025 with the official study guide and actual test questions. Learn about Canada's history, values, government and symbols with 80+ interactive lessons, quizzes and tests. 

THE OFFICIAL STUDY GUIDE
All the app's material is based on Discover Canada: The Rights and Responsibilities of Citizenship. Practice with the province-specific questions that you will be asked on the citizenship test. Get full explanations for every question.

80 LESSONS, 600+ QUESTIONS, 30+ TESTS
Access all the practice you'll need to pass the test. Study chapter by chapter, and try over 600 questions at the end of the lessons. Time-limited tests help you test your knowledge with the 30-minute time limit of the actual test. Get feedback on your correct and incorrect answers.

FULL WORD GLOSSARY
Don't know the meaning of a word? No worries! Access to a full content-focused dictionary and improve your vocabulary while studying for your citizenship test.

LISTEN TO THE LESSONS
Use the audio-enabled lessons and easily follow each paragraph, word by word with better concentration. 

TRACK TEST & STUDY PROGRESS
Keep track of your progress through the chapters and lessons. Keep track of your test scores and average time. Easily pick up where you left off with the Continue Studying shortcut.

FULL OFFLINE MODE
Study on the go! Use the app wherever you go without an internet connection, and still access all the lessons, quizzes and tests.

OTHER FEATURES: 
- Province-Specific Content
- Feedback on All Correct and Incorrect Answers
- Customizable Study Reminders
- Dark Mode Support (with automatic switch)
- Countdown to Your Test Date
- Listen To Glossary Words Pronunciations

- - - - - - - - - - - - 

Disclaimer: This app is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by the Government of Canada or Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC). This independent app is for educational purposes only.


Feedback on the app, the content, or the questions? We always would love to hear back from you! You can reach us at hello@citizenshipapp.ca.

Love the app?

Please take a moment to leave a review and let us know what you think. Also, don't forget to follow us on Instagram @canadiancitizenship. 

Proudly made in Toronto, Ontario.

Bring the beauty of the stars down to Earth. Hold Sky Guide® overhead to automatically identify any star, constellation, planet or satellite! Easy to use and powerful, it’s epic stargazing for any experience level.

Is it a star or the planet Mars? Knowing what’s up in your night sky is easier than ever. Sky Guide’s AR mode superimposes figures onto your real sky so visualizing the heavens becomes effortless. Have you ever wished you could recognize constellations but didn’t want to fumble around with paper star charts? Now you can.

A speck of light crosses the night sky, growing brighter. What could it be? You don’t have to wonder anymore. Track a bright satellite and receive perfectly-timed notifications whenever the International Space Station is about to fly over your location. With Sky Guide, you’ll be saying ‘Goodbye, aliens’ and ‘Hellooooo, astronauts!’

Voyage to the past or future with cinematic time controls. Know where the Moon will be later in the evening so you can capture that perfect photo or be an eyewitness to history’s greatest comets.

Whether you’re searching for Sagittarius, Saturn, or the next big meteor shower, Sky Guide is jam-packed with information and rich graphics that will satisfy the most curious minds. Plus, stay current with location-filtered events like solar and lunar eclipses with Sky Guide’s personalized Calendar.

Camping in the backcountry? Sky Guide can function with or without Wi-Fi, cellular service or GPS, so everything is at your fingertips no matter where you go.

Join the millions who have discovered a more personal connection to the stars with Sky Guide. It might forever change the way you look up.

Cardly: Trading Card Identifier and Collection Manager

We know collecting cards is exciting, yet it can also get very frustrating. You find a rare pull, but you’re not sure of its real price. Your binder is full, but you can’t remember which cards you already own. You’re browsing a marketplace and wonder if you’re about to overpay. For many trading card collectors, these problems take the fun out of the hobby.

Cardly was built to solve them. With powerful card recognition and live market data, Cardly makes it easy to scan, identify, and organize your collection, so you can focus on enjoying the game instead of stressing over the details.

SCAN AND IDENTIFY CARD INSTANTLY
Take a photo of any trading card and Cardly will recognize it within seconds. The app identifies key details including name, set, expansion, rarity, and card number. It works across major TCGs and sports cards, giving collectors fast, accurate scans without guesswork.

REAL-TIME PRICE TRACKING
Card values shift constantly, and missing a change can mean overpaying or underselling. Cardly helps you stay ahead with live price data from trusted marketplaces. With Cardly, you can instantly see:

* Lowest and average market prices
* Price history and trend insights
* Total estimated collection value

Whether you’re trading, selling, or holding, you’ll always know where your cards stand in the market.

ORGANIZE YOUR COLLECTION
Messy binders, boxes, and spreadsheets make it hard to keep track of what you own. Cardly solves this by turning your cards into a clean digital collection. Save scans into your binder, group cards into sets or decks, mark duplicates and favorites, and track your entire collection’s value at a glance. 

With Cardly, everything stays safe, searchable, and easy to update.

AI CHAT FOR COLLECTORS
Cardly’s built-in chat is designed to make collecting easier. You can ask about card rarity, formats, or strategies and get straightforward answers. It also helps you discover related cards and provides context that’s useful for both beginners and experienced collectors.

SUPPORTS ALL MAJOR GAMES
Cardly recognizes and tracks a growing list of popular games:
* Pokémon TCG
* Magic the Gathering (MTG)
* Yu-Gi-Oh!
* Digimon
* Disney Lorcana
* One Piece Card Game
* Sports cards tracker for basketball, baseball, football, and more.

From casual fans to serious investors, Cardly is built for anyone who wants to collect smarter, play better, and trade with confidence.

WHY COLLECTORS CHOOSE CARDLY
* Fast and accurate scans
* Real-time price tracking
* Digital collection management
* Support for both TCGs and sports cards
* Simple, reliable, and built for collectors

Download Cardly today and take control of your collection! With Cardly, every scan brings clarity, every card has its place, and every collector has the confidence to collect, play, and trade smarter.

With cutting-edge AI for translation, Translate AI offers real-time voice and audio translator tools, camera-based AI image translation, text translation, and an offline phrasebook—all in one sleek app. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to seamless, global conversations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Voice & Audio Translator
Experience fluent, two-way communication with our live voice translator. Speak naturally and get instant results with our AI auto translate engine. Perfect for business, travel, and everyday use.

AI Camera & Photo Translator

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

AI Text Translator

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.
Translate Audio with Ease
The built-in audio translator makes spoken communication fast and fluid. Great for meetings, voice memos, or casual conversation.
Supports Over 100 Languages
From English, Spanish, and French to Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, and more, Translate AI gives you access to over 100 supported languages.
Offline Phrasebook
 Save key phrases and access them even without the internet. Your must-have tool for travelers and emergencies.
Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI
 Our app uses advanced AI quick translate technology that adapts to your tone and context. It’s like having an intelligent interpreter in your pocket.

Why Choose Translate AI?

Fast and intuitive ai translator for speech, text, and images
All-in-one live translator with voice, camera, and typing options
Translate now with zero delays or complications
Ideal ai chat translator for everyday conversations and social apps
Innovative auto translator that learns your language patterns

Use Cases:

Travel: Navigate new places with confidence. Use your live translator to understand signs, menus, or directions instantly.

Business: Make global communication effortless in meetings and negotiations with your reliable ai translator.

Learning: Boost your language learning with ai quick translate tools and real-life examples.

On-the-Go: Rely on the camera and image translator to understand foreign packaging, documents, or signage.
Whether you’re learning a new language, traveling the globe, or connecting across cultures, Translate AI is the smartest way to speak fluently and confidently. With our built-in AI for translation, you can say what you mean and understand what others say—without delay.

Break the language barrier. Speak freely. Translate now.
